title: HELP
body: I played {{champion:84}} last game and my score was 21/8/12 AND I DIDNT GET AN S then i played fizz 14/5/9 or something and got an s PLZ EXPLAIN IM MSTRY 5 AKALI AND I SHODUV GOTTA TOKEN IM VERY SAD SAVE MEEEEEEE{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: well as alkalis are assassins they probably willet scores like that so i get was u mean
Akali's are way harder to get s'es on as they are very easy to play, which means someone in the server has possibly even gone 32/3/8

Literally 0 point in trying to compare your scores for fizz and akali because the grade you receive is based on the[ **same champ** in the **same role**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/champion-mastery) compared to everyone else on the server. While your KDA may have been impressive, your CS/other factors were probably lacking and you may have had slightly too many deaths to be in the top x% of Akali players to get your token.

Keep going, you'll get that elusive token eventually :D
thanks but just now i got an s on akali in this is why I'm really tilted because it was on my surf account and i was only 12/7/6 but thanks for the tip anyways

Keep in mind it's not just KDA that matters. Its all time relative, so your cs per min might have been higher, kill participation, objective participation and all that jazz. Don't do basing it off KDA alone and tilt off that
